author: schmendrick
title: Quicker than a wink the fire is out
review:
You can't have enough of these cool little fire chief quads. And the price is perfect for a little present in between.

Bright side of the moon:
+ Flexible axles (ideal for all-terrain ;)
+ Car body can be removed and the chassis used for own vehicle constructions

Dark side of the moon:
- nothing

Additional stuff:
If the axles begin to squeek, just use some silicone spray and your ears will no longer be agonized. And mentioned "agonized": The flashing light is without function. No sound. No flickering lights. Relaxing :)
